AFR101A.name: Elementary Swahili I
AFR101A.description: Speaking, reading, and writing Swahili, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency.

AFR101B.name: Elementary African Language I
AFR101B.description: African language at the elementary level. Speaking, reading, and writing, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills. Specific language varies.

AFR102A.name: Elementary Swahili II
AFR102A.description: Further work on speaking, reading, and writing Swahili, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR102B.name: Elementary African Language II
AFR102B.description: Further work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR151.name: Beginning Individualized African Language I
AFR151.description: Individualized study of an African language at the elementary level. Speaking, reading, and writing, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR152.name: Beginning Individualized African Language II
AFR152.description: Further individualized work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR201A.name: Second Year Swahili I
AFR201A.description: Intermediate-level work on speaking, reading, and writing Swahili, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR201B.name: Second Year African Language I
AFR201B.description: Intermediate-level work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR202A.name: Second-Year Swahili II
AFR202A.description: Further intermediate-level work on speaking, reading, and writing Swahili, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR202B.name: Second-Year African Language II
AFR202B.description: Further intermediate-level work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR251.name: Intermediate Individualized African Language I
AFR251.description: Intermediate-level individualized work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR252.name: Intermediate Individualized African Language II
AFR252.description: Further intermediate-level individualized work on speaking, reading, and writing an African language, with continued emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR290.name: Independent Study
AFR290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
AFR290.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
AFR290.restrictions: Not open to freshmen. Approval of department.

AFR301A.name: Third Year Swahili I
AFR301A.description: Development of listening, speaking, reading and writing skills beyond the intermediate level. Intensive work on authentic texts covering contemporary issues in East and Central Africa.

AFR302A.name: Third Year Swahili II
AFR302A.description: Development of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills beyond the intermediate level. Intensive work on authentic texts covering contemporary issues in East and Central Africa.

AFR450A.name: Advanced Swahili
AFR450A.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
AFR450A.description: Advanced study of Swahili. Speaking, reading, and writing, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills.

AFR450B.name: Advanced African Language
AFR450B.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
AFR450B.description: Advanced study of an African language. Speaking, reading, and writing, with emphasis on developing oral proficiency skills. Language varies.

AFR490.name: Independent Study
AFR490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
AFR490.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
AFR490.restrictions: Not open to sophomores or freshmen. Approval of department.
